Publications

The effect of school closures and reopening strategies on COVID-19 infection dynamics in the San Francisco Bay Area: a cross-sectional survey and modeling analysis. J. R. Soc. Interface 2021. doi:10.1098/rsif.2020.0970

Incidence, clinical outcomes, and transmission dynamics of severe coronavirus disease 2019 in California and Washington: prospective cohort study. BMJ 2020. doi:10.1136/bmj.m1923
